Package entity

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Combatant
    A combatant is an occupant that is able to fight; this implies that they have all the attributes that a typical player has, such as health, momentum, an inventory, and equipment.
    Entity
    An entity is one that is able to, on it's own (or AI controlled) volition, interact with the grid state.
    Occupant
    An occupant is an extension of an entity that is able to occupy a tile on the grid.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Player
    The player (You).
